channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Animate
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Animate

item.title: CVE-2024-47418|2024-10-09T12:34:56.334Z -- adobe -- animate
item.description: Animate versions 23.0.7, 24.0.4 and earlier are affected by a Use After Free vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2024-47412|2024-10-09T12:37:31.592Z -- adobe -- animate
item.description: Animate versions 23.0.7, 24.0.4 and earlier are affected by a Use After Free vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2024-47411|2024-10-09T12:36:07.275Z -- adobe -- animate
item.description: Animate versions 23.0.7, 24.0.4 and earlier are affected by an Access of Uninitialized Pointer vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2024-47420|2024-10-09T12:34:46.298Z -- adobe -- animate
item.description: Animate versions 23.0.7, 24.0.4 and earlier are affected by an out-of-bounds read vulnerability that could lead to disclosure of sensitive memory. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to bypass mitigations such as ASLR. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.
